about_the_game:
During his journey, our main hero discovers a special place in the world of Pentarull - the Winter Edge. In the snowy expanses he needs to find an unusual object, and charming Heyla Iron helps him in this. However, there will be difficulties on his way: new monster girls are already waiting for the hero, who will defeat them in a passionate battle.

Features of Jelly Christmas DLC:

🎄 New region with special design

🎄 New monster girls with their own individual stories

🎄 Exclusive H-scenes, erotic cards and puzzles!

🎄 New side quests

🎄 New battle cards

🎄 New achievements on Steam

🎄 Unique wallpapers for desktop

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters in the game are adults (18+)
The game contains adult content including nudity and sex scenes, swearing and smoking scenes.

The game features nude girls, monster girls and animated porno scenes with them, also erotic cards and puzzles.

short_description: The first DLC for our game "AURA: Hentai Cards" will be about the upcoming holiday - Christmas! You will have the opportunity to visit a unique region, as well as meet new monster girls. That is where a SPECIAL mission from our much-loved Heyla Iron awaits you!
supported_languages: English, Russian, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Polish, Spanish - Latin America, German, Romanian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Bulgarian
